segments.text: I need a room for a few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That won't be a problem . Could you please tell me your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: John Sandals . That's S A N D A L S .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , I'm Michelle , and I run the front desk . Please tell me the days you'll be here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll be there in April Friday through Monday , the 14th through the 17th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We recently changed many things here , sir , including our prices . Do you mind , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The price will be $ 308 a night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Now , Mr . Sandals , about the room , smoking or nonsmoking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most of our clients prefer nonsmoking . Now , does a queen sound okay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One more second , sir . Your reservation is now verified , so all I need is your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me repeat that 626-555-1739 . Okay , sir , we look forward to seeing you in April !
segments.speaker: S2
